chip

Class USChipAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • chip.USChip
      • chip.USChipAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRFIDChip

    public class USChipAdapter
extends USChip
implements IRFIDChip
    An adapter for US RFID chips to ensure compatibility between IRFIDChip and USChip and to convert messages to US adaptions. This class extends the USChip and implements the Adapter Design Pattern by delegating the correct requests sent from IRFIDChip to USChip. There the adapter converts the request into US standards and calls the super methods/constructors.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      USChipAdapter()
      Constructs a new USChipAdapter to convert to USChip.

public boolean hasValidTicket()
        Deprecated. because the chip should not have access to the ticket repository. Possible security vulnerability.
        Checks whether the ticket saved on the RFID chip is registered in the ticket repository. Calls the super method.
